name: LinkedIn Document Post
primary_goal_vibe: Deep education, frameworks, playbooks, and structured professional knowledge sharing.
tone_preference: Expert, structured, and highly actionable. Clear and outcome-focused.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The first slide must clearly state the outcome or promise. The caption should summarize the value in one short paragraph and clarify who the document is for. Encourage saving and sharing.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Line 1: promise or outcome. Body: what the document covers and who it benefits. Final line: save/share CTA.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Short to medium. Enough to frame the document without repeating it.

document_structure_guidelines.primary_role: Deliver structured knowledge in a skimmable, slide-based format.
best_practices: Strong cover slide with clear promise
Logical progression from problem to solution

hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Use tags that match the role, discipline, and industry.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag collaborators, sources, or companies referenced when appropriate.

technical_constraints.mobile_readability_note: All text must be legible on small screens.

required_elements: Clear document promise on first slide
Caption that explains who this is for
disallowed_practices: Repeating the entire document content in the caption
